description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for editing a user profile, including form validation and state management.

classes.name: EditProfileScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a screen for editing user profiles.

classes.name: _EditProfileScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the form and logic for EditProfileScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and TextEditingControllers with current profile data.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TextEditingControllers to free resources.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the profile editing screen.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Validates form input, updates the profile, and navigates back.
